name: New Job Description
description:
This is game was developed as part of the ICT Game JAM  and we had 2 days to design, create and develop the game.

The game is set around a janitor who tries to show in and around of the spaceship to his new replacement. The whole situation goes haywire, when they encounter some unwanted guests on the spaceship.

WASD to move

Left click to make the new hire move/stop
